constraints.customMessage: The scope must be a ME type or a valid generic type.

description: Specifies the behavior of the events card. Paging, entity - event selectors etc.

constraints.customMessage: In markdown brackets use only seaOtter links (https://dt-url.net/XXXXXXX) or action expression

description.documentation:
Markdown syntax can be used to enrich description. To define a link, you can only use seaOtter links (https://dt-url.net/XXXXXXX) or action expression 

 The format of a single action expression is: actionName|key=param|key2=param2

displayChart.description: When true, the chart will be displayed above the list.

entitySelectorTemplates.description: Up to 10 entity selectors, used to fetch data for related entities
entitySelectorTemplates.documentation:
For example for a host screen where you want to show the processes charts this might look like this:  
`type(PROCESS_GROUP_INSTANCE), fromRelationships.isProcessOf($(entityConditions))`

Please mind that the `$(entityConditions)` is a placeholder for the relation condition.

Leave empty to gather data for current entity.

eventSelectorTemplate.description: An event selector that is used to fetch events for related entities

constraints.customMessage: Element identifier must only contain letters, numbers or '-', '_'.

key.description: Unique key, which is used to map to this events card in the screen layout config

showFiltering.description: Enable or disable filtering bar at the bottom of the card

showPagination.description: Enable or disable pagination bar at the bottom of the card
